user_query: I'm planning a weekend getaway with my friends and we want to explore new hiking trails. Can you recommend some TED talks about nature and adventure? Additionally, provide a list of random words to create a group name. Lastly, suggest a campsite with a starry sky view.

TaskList.description: Research and recommend TED talks related to nature and adventure.
Generate a list of random words suitable for creating a group name.
Find a campsite that offers a view of the starry sky.
